content: We are happy to announce a new request for proposals, available here: http://sql.ai. We've developed a web service that performs static verification of SQL queries by translation into category theory, and are requesting proposals for delivering that capability into various SQL-based software stacks.
Interesting! It is not clear to me what sort of issues this static analysis is designed to catch, would you have concrete examples to share? Also, there is a typo on the main page: "algorithims".
